sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Lockheed Martin Corp (Symbol: LMT), where a total of 5,693 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 569,300 underlying shares.
That amounts to about 45.5% of LMT's average daily trading volume over the past month of 1.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $300 strike put option expiring July 06, 2018 , with 327 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 32,700 underlying shares of LMT.

Below is a chart showing LMT's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $300 strike highlighted in orange:

Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 25,408 contracts, representing approximately 2.5 million underlying shares or approximately 45.3% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 5.6 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $152.50 strike call option expiring July 20, 2018 , with 4,902 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 490,200 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $152.50 strike highlighted in orange:

And General Electric Co (Symbol: GE) options are showing a volume of 284,350 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 28.4 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 41.7% of GE's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 68.3 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $12.50 strike put option expiring July 20, 2018 , with 94,836 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 9.5 million underlying shares of GE.

Below is a chart showing GE's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $12.50 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for LMT options , CRM options , or GE options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
